title: How to show the battle boss baron icon in game?
body: How do you do it, and after the arcade event is over can you still show the icon in your games?

replies.body: I now bought Baron icon for 80 Tickets but i dont know how to use/equip it. If thats that i equiped for my Summoner Icon. Pls help
Once you have the Emote Icon equipped, you should be able to use Ctrl+6 to use the Arcade emote.
